8000.description: Port for web interface. Suggested default: 8420.
8000.label: WebUI port

/usr/src/paperless/data.description: Choose a Share for data file storage.
/usr/src/paperless/data.label: Config paperless Data - Storage

/usr/src/paperless/media.description: Choose a Share for media storage.
/usr/src/paperless/media.label: Config paperless Media - Storage

/usr/src/paperless/export.description: Choose a Share for exported documents.
/usr/src/paperless/export.label: Config paperless Export - Storage

/usr/src/paperless/consume.description: Choose a Share for importing documents.
/usr/src/paperless/consume.label: Config paperless Import - Storage

PAPERLESS_ADMIN_USER.description: Enter the username for the paperless-ngx superuser.
PAPERLESS_ADMIN_USER.label: Superuser username

PAPERLESS_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: This will be the password of the automatically created superuser.
PAPERLESS_ADMIN_PASSWORD.label: Superuser password

PAPERLESS_SECRET_KEY.description: Adjust this key if you plan to make paperless available publicly.
PAPERLESS_SECRET_KEY.label: Paperless Secretkey

PAPERLESS_URL.description: This is required if you will be exposing Paperless-ngx on a public domain. E.g. https://paperless.domain.com
PAPERLESS_URL.label: Paperless URL

PAPERLESS_CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS.description: Set to the value of Paperless URL
PAPERLESS_CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS.label: CSRF Trusted Origins

/data.description: Choose a Share for Redis data.
/data.label: Redis Data Share

/var/lib/postgresql/data.description: Choose a Share for PostgreSQL database storage.
/var/lib/postgresql/data.label: PostgreSQL Storage

Paperless-ngx.description:
Paperless DMS - a private & secure Document Management System.

Based on the official Docker image: ghcr.io/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
